features.verifiedDesc: All service providers pass a verification process to ensure your safety.

features.protectedDesc: Your payment is held securely until you confirm the service is complete.

community.title: A Community That Grows Together
community.subtitle: More than a platform, we are a network of neighbors helping neighbors. Connect, collaborate, and thrive.

step1.title: Connect Locally
step1.description: Find trusted people in your own neighborhood ready to help or hire.

step2.title: Collaborate & Share
step2.description: Exchange skills and services to solve daily challenges together.

step3.title: Grow Together
step3.description: Build lasting relationships and strengthen your local economy.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Getting help or starting to earn is easier than ever. Follow these simple steps.

step1.title: 1. Search or Post
step1.description: Describe the service you need or create your profile to offer your skills.

step2.title: 2. Connect & Schedule
step2.description: Receive offers from professionals or job opportunities and schedule the details.

step3.title: 3. Get It Done
step3.description: Complete the service and handle payments securely through the platform.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.description: Learn the basics to use AidMarkt

services.title: Services
services.description: Everything about offering and requesting services

createAccount.title: How to create an account
createAccount.content:
To create an account on AidMarkt, follow these steps:

1. Click 'Sign Up' on the main page
2. Complete your personal information
3. Verify your email
4. Upload required documents
5. Done! You can now use the platform

profileSetup.title: Set up your profile
profileSetup.content:
A complete profile helps you get more jobs:

• Upload a professional photo
• Describe your skills
• Add your experience
• Set your availability
• Complete identity verification

requestService.title: How to request a service
requestService.content:
To request help:

1. Click 'Search for help'
2. Describe in detail what you need
3. Set date, time and location
4. Define your budget
5. Publish your request
6. Review the offers you receive

offerService.title: How to offer services
offerService.content:
To earn income by helping:

1. Complete your professional profile
2. Define your services and rates
3. Set your availability
4. Respond to relevant requests
5. Negotiate terms if necessary
6. Confirm the work

paymentProcess.title: How payments work
paymentProcess.content:
AidMarkt guarantees secure payments:

• Money is held until the service is completed
• Customer confirms satisfaction
• Payment is released to the provider
• 10% commission per transaction
• Payments processed in 24-48 hours

withdrawMoney.title: Withdraw money
withdrawMoney.content:
To withdraw your earnings:

1. Go to your wallet
2. Click 'Withdraw'
3. Select your payment method
4. Confirm the amount
5. Money will arrive in 1-3 business days

safetyTips.title: Safety tips
safetyTips.content:
For your safety:

• Always verify the user's identity
• Communicate only through the platform
• Report suspicious behavior
• Don't share sensitive personal information
• Trust your instincts

faq1.question: How can I change my password?
faq1.answer: Go to your profile, click 'Edit profile' and then 'Change password'. Enter your current password and the new one.

faq2.question: What should I do if I don't receive responses to my request?
faq2.answer: Make sure your request is clear and detailed. You can also adjust the budget or expand the search area.

faq3.question: How long does it take to process a payment?
faq3.answer: Payments are processed automatically 24 hours after the customer confirms service satisfaction.

faq4.question: Can I cancel a service that's already confirmed?
faq4.answer: Yes, but it must be done at least 24 hours in advance. Late cancellations may affect your rating.

faq5.question: How do I report a problem with another user?
faq5.answer: Use the 'Report' button on the user's profile or contact support directly through chat.

request.title: Find immediate help
request.subtitle: Tell us what kind of help you need to find the right person.

oferente.title: Service information
oferente.subtitle: Tell us what services you can offer and your availability

requestService.whatNeedDesc: Describe your task in a few words so providers can quickly understand what you need.
requestService.whatNeedPlaceholder: e.g. Help moving my sofa from the second floor
requestService.whenNeed: When do you need it done?
requestService.whenNeedDesc: Choose the option that best fits your availability.
requestService.dateExactDesc: I need it on a specific day
requestService.dateFlexibleGoodDesc: By being flexible with dates, you're more likely to receive proposals from providers and can negotiate better prices.
requestService.selectExactDatePlaceholder: What day do you need the service?
requestService.selectBeforeDatePlaceholder: Before what date do you need it ready?
requestService.needSpecificTime: I need a specific time of day
requestService.budgetDesc: Indicate an approximate budget. Remember you can always negotiate the final price with the provider.
requestService.budgetNote: Providers will be able to make counter-offers
requestService.describeProjectDesc: Provide all important details so providers understand exactly what you need.
requestService.describeProjectPlaceholder: For example: I need help moving a 3-seater sofa from my second-floor apartment to my new house. The sofa weighs approximately 80kg and I need it moved on Saturday morning...
requestService.whereWork: Where will the work be done?
requestService.whereWorkDesc: Select if you need the provider to go to a specific location or if the work can be done online.
requestService.locationPresentialDesc: The provider must go to a specific location
requestService.locationOnlineDesc: The work can be done remotely
requestService.addressLabel: Address where the work will be done
requestService.addressNote: This information will only be shared with selected providers
requestService.addImagesDesc: Images help providers better understand your project and make more accurate proposals.
requestService.paymentDesc: Your request will be published immediately after confirming payment.
requestService.paymentDesc2: You only pay when the work is completed to your satisfaction.
requestService.paymentProtectedDesc: Your money is completely safe with us. We hold your payment in escrow and only release it to the provider when you confirm the work has been completed satisfactorily.
requestService.successDesc: Your task has been published and you will soon start receiving proposals from qualified providers.
requestService.receiveProposalsDesc: Providers will start sending their offers
requestService.compareChatDesc: Review profiles and talk to candidates
requestService.chooseConfirmDesc: Select the best provider and schedule the work
requestService.paymentProtectedNote: Your payment is protected until the work is completed
